h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai
content: The Centipede Guai can also perform two slow frontal sweeps with its main claws, alternating a claw on each side, but with its fairly slow swings you can step to the side to focus on its legs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The Centipede Guai can also perform two slow frontal sweeps with its main claws, alternating a claw on each side, but with its fairly slow swings you can step to the side to focus on its legs.
